orm_stack_assessment.Competitive_Edge: Matches or exceeds Rosebud AI and HeyBoss AI technology stack

JSONB fields.recommendation: Add JSONB fields for flexible metadata storage

Soft deletes.evidence: No deleted_at timestamps found in models
Soft deletes.recommendation: Add soft delete functionality with deleted_at timestamps

Time-series models.evidence: UsageMetrics has time-based aggregation with period_start/period_end
Time-series models.recommendation: Expand time-series capabilities for AI usage tracking

Vector embeddings.evidence: No vector columns or pgvector usage found
Vector embeddings.recommendation: Add vector embedding support for semantic search capabilities

Multi-tenancy.evidence: Models have owner_id, user_id, and project-based data isolation

key_strengths: 🏆 Comprehensive user management with OAuth providers
🏆 Advanced asset management with AI metadata tracking
🏆 Production-ready audit logging and compliance features
🏆 Enterprise-grade rate limiting and API management
🏆 GDPR compliance with user consent tracking
🏆 Comprehensive usage metrics for billing integration
critical_gaps: ❌ Missing DriftEvent model in AI & ML Workflow Models
❌ Missing Dataset model in AI & ML Workflow Models
❌ Missing Subscription model in System & Monitoring Models
❌ Missing Notification model in System & Monitoring Models
❌ Missing JSONB fields: Add JSONB fields for flexible metadata storage
❌ Missing Soft deletes: Add soft delete functionality with deleted_at timestamps
❌ Missing Vector embeddings: Add vector embedding support for semantic search capabilities

recommendations.description: Add deleted_at timestamps to all models instead of hard deletes
recommendations.impact: Enables data recovery and maintains referential integrity

recommendations.description: Integrate pgvector for semantic search of assets and templates
recommendations.impact: Enables AI-powered discovery and recommendation features

recommendations.description: Add Purchase model to complete Game Template & Marketplace Models functionality
recommendations.impact: Enables advanced features for enterprise customers

recommendations.description: Add DriftEvent model to complete AI & ML Workflow Models functionality
recommendations.impact: Enables advanced features for enterprise customers

recommendations.description: Add Dataset model to complete AI & ML Workflow Models functionality
recommendations.impact: Enables advanced features for enterprise customers

recommendations.description: Add Subscription model to complete System & Monitoring Models functionality
recommendations.impact: Enables advanced features for enterprise customers

recommendations.description: Add more granular time-series tracking for AI usage patterns

vs_Rosebud_AI: ✅ Multi-provider AI vs single provider lock-in
✅ Comprehensive audit logging vs minimal tracking
✅ Advanced rate limiting vs basic quotas
✅ Professional asset management vs simple file storage
vs_HeyBoss_AI: ✅ Game-specific templates vs generic website templates
✅ AI model training capabilities vs consumption-only
✅ Advanced user roles vs basic permissions
Unique_Differentiators: 🏆 AI model training and fine-tuning capabilities
🏆 Advanced cost tracking and billing integration
